title: Adaptive resistance to cefiderocol in carbapenem-resistant Acinetobacter baumannii (CRAB): Microbiological and clinical issues
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Anissa Desmoulin, Loïk Sababadichetty, Laure Kamus, Marion Daniel, Lucie Feletti, Nicolas Allou, Anaïs Potron, Anne-Gaëlle Leroy, Marie-Christine Jaffar-Bandjee, Olivier Belmonte, Thomas Garrigos, Guillaume Miltgen
